articles.title: Asia shares dip, oil skids on Shanghai shutdown By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Asia shares and oil slip; yen sinks as BOJ stays super-loose
articles.content:
By Wayne Cole
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Asian shares and oil prices both slid on Monday as coronavirus lockdown in Shanghai looked set to hit global activity, while the yen extended its stomach-churning de… [+3402 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Ikhsan Fandi brace gives Lions win in front of record crowd; Malaysia coach finds it 'difficult to say' if Singapore deserves victory - AsiaOne
